name: AstroLaser
description:
Warning: dangerously fun.

Shoot the enemy ships with colored lasers as they fly in from all angles. Blast those enemy ships to bits with a variety of unlockable weapons, including a double laser, triple laser, shockwave, and even a nuke!

Even choose from a variety of weapon colors to shred those enemies in style!

The keys to the AstroLaser cockpit can be all yours at the push of a button. It's a no-brainer!
